infos.value: It would be best if I didn't go to Wezette...
There is no cause for concern.
B-but... Surely they would suspect me for a spy of Hourne.
It would cause naught but problems for Leonis.
Fear not. I do not lose face over such trivial matters.
On the contrary, they might seek to make a vassal out of you.
Me, under the command of King Khury of Wezette?
The king of Wezette hasn't been blessed with a leader of note for generations.
No doubt the very thought of attaining the First Sword of «Solidus» would have the man licking his chops.
It's a fair comment. He may even want you to inherit the throne of Wezette someday.
Ah, forgive me. You've only recently lost your betrothed...
